img_text: 00:18 D KTweet Aberdeen FC @AberdeenFC 4h Information for supporters ahead of tomorrow's @ScottishCup match at Ibrox bit.ly/2HhvOyu Please note: There will be a minutes silence before kick off for former Rangers player Eric Caldow who passed away recently Ronnie I @RonnieAllison8 Replying to @AberdeenFC and @ScottishCup So? 20:12 11 Mar 19 Twitter for iPhone 1 Retweet 3 Likes Tweet your reply
